subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After three seasons of trying to climb back on the top rung of American sports since its devastating lockout, the N.H.L. finally finds itself with a Stanley Cup Finals it can brag about.
snippet: After three seasons of trying to climb back on the top rung of American sports since its devastating lockout, the N.H.L. finally finds itself with a Stanley Cup Finals it can brag about.
